text: @realDonaldTrump @ibikus31 You got them. And look at NYC. At the very beginning De Blasio told his citizens to live the regular life. Coronavirus will not hit the city. Arrrgh, he failed. We will not forget what they told us, what they told you and what your government has done  since it started in China.
